title: Monthly Fan Club Meeting
description: Join fellow Lou Gehrig fans for our monthly discussion meeting. We'll be covering recent memorabilia finds and planning upcoming events.

title: Gehrig Trivia Night
description: Test your knowledge of the Iron Horse with our monthly trivia competition. Prizes for the top three teams!

title: Yankees Spring Training Trip
description: Join us for a group trip to Tampa to watch the Yankees in spring training. Experience where Lou Gehrig once prepared for the season.

title: Lou Gehrig Appreciation Day
description: Annual celebration of Lou Gehrig's legacy at Yankee Stadium. Special ceremonies and commemorative events.

title: ALS Research Fundraiser Gala
description: Elegant evening supporting ALS research in honor of Lou Gehrig. Includes dinner, silent auction, and keynote speaker.

title: Memorabilia Show & Tell
description: Bring your Lou Gehrig collectibles to share with the group. Expert appraisals available.
